issue.title: [C++][Python] Include UDFOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16041](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16041). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the first stage of the development, we do not support function options to be taken from Python UDFs. But this is a feature that is required for advanced users.
